column4: I have an editor, Intellij Idea on Ubuntu, and I normally launch it by going to the directory and typing ./idea.sh
I tried to create a link to launch it.. but its not wokring out
on the launcher or the file?
a terminal opens up quickly and disappears
and it works just fine if you run it from terminal?
how did you create the luncher?
and what did you type for command?
hehe, I actually found that minutes ago, why I go this new idea... he is exporting the java path again.. and I have my export in bash.rc which I've noticed is for terminal only
